data.name: VPNDescription
data.value: A VPN (Virtual Private Network) is a technology that provides a secure connection over the Internet. It hides your real IP address, encrypts all traffic, and allows you to work safely even on public Wi-Fi networks. A VPN is necessary to protect personal data, bypass blocks, maintain privacy, and ensure business security.

data.name: ChooseVPNSolution
data.value: Choose the perfect VPN solution for your needs

data.value: We will connect, configure and ensure stable operation of your network â€” from cloud CHR to physical MikroTik or corporate Fortinet. Without unnecessary complexity and with support at every stage.

data.name: FortinetDescription
data.value: Fortinet is enterprise-level network security equipment, more complex than MikroTik, and its configuration requires more time and experience. Fortinet requires advanced certification and time (often 4-8 hours or more), so rates are above average.
